items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WebRTC signaling library written in TypeScript, using WebSocket and Protocol Buffers to exchange SDP (Session Description Protocol) messages
items.title: PHP-WebRTC/signaling-js-sdk: A lightweight and efficient WebRTC signaling library written in TypeScript, using WebSocket and Protocol Buffers to exchange SDP (Session Description Protocol) messages

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
items.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
items.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: A minimalist to-do list app built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Firebase. This lightweight application lets users add, complete, and manage tasks with a clean interface and real-time data syncing via Firebase. Built for speed and simplicity using modern front-end tools and best practices.
items.title: pronayguha13/clearlist: A minimalist to-do list app built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Firebase. This lightweight application lets users add, complete, and manage tasks with a clean interface and real-time data syncing via Firebase. Built for speed and simplicity using modern front-end tools and best practices.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
items.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
